content.content: Back from Japan. Saw neural interfaces in daily life—makes you wonder, how will this tech change who we are? Big potential, big questions.
content.raw_content:
**@XavierTechTakes**

Just returned from Japan, where the blend of tradition and tech was eye-opening. The integration of neural interfaces in daily life got me thinking - how will this tech redefine our identity and relationships? The potential is immense, but so are the ethical dilemmas. #TechReflections #FutureSociety
